6.25.18  9:03 pm   hi thanks for answering my previous question (i don't know how to link other questions here but i asked yesterday at 8:53 about my jazz theory book). big relief to know that i'll be safe just learning songs, but i'm wondering: when you were learning songs to teach yourself that stuff, did the knowledge sort of come intuitively throughout the process of learning a bunch of songs?

      or did you make a specific effort to analyze the songs' goodness?

      if the latter, what exactly did you focus on?

      i'm sort of lost as to what exactly i should be analyzing if that (voicings, chord progressions, melodies?).

      thanks so much and i love your music and videos

6.25.18  11:12 am   i bought stick control and opened it and did the exercises maybe once or twice. then it turned out the way i actually became a much better drummer very quickly was by joining a band, because they were like "we're doing these songs" and i didn't know how to play them but they seemed like an interesting challenge.

this isn't a question but i just want you, and maybe other people if you post this, to know that the advice to ditch the books with the mind numbing exercises and find some music you care about is Good, especially because nobody *has* to play music unless they already loved it enough at some point to ignore everyone's advice and become a professional. thanks

6.25.18  9:07 am   I need a bit of help. Every time I try starting a new project, I think it's going to be great and wonderful. I do in fact start it, however I just stop in the middle of making it and never finish it. Sometimes I even think of a new project that I want to make and completely scrap the old one. Then I get stuck in a loop of half-doing projects.

A third of my computer are now WIP projects that I'm never going to finish. It's quite horrible, but I never really delete them because I think to myself "I'll do it once. I'll finish all of them". I never do, and I just continue filling my computer with half-done projects.

Is there a way for me to stop doing this? I haven't finished a single project for many months, even though I want to do it.
6.25.18  7:46 am   Can you help with depression or anxiety?
